item.description:
Herb Pearce is going to be leading a very passionate workshop about romance and true love. Here is a description from Herb:

“Learn the difference between romantic love and true love. You'll get a history lesson on love and romance and ways to experience relationship with less pain and more satisfaction. We'll look at true love which supports caring, awareness of difference, good communication and letting go of false fantasies though a little fantasy is great! Just in time for Valentine's Day!”

The suggested minimum cost of attending the workshop is $15.00. A sliding scale of any amount is allowed if the cost would otherwise prevent you from coming. The traditional cost of this workshop has been $40.00 so if you can afford more than $15.00, it helps the presenter and those who pay less.

Refreshments will be served. We are also welcomed to bring and share our own food as long as there is not any meat in it.
item.name: Romance and True Love
